title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.20 - Additional (paid-in) capital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.20 - Additional (paid-in) capital

State Regulations

Contributions of corporate stockholders credited to
accounts other than capital stock; sources: an excess over par or stated value
received from the sale or exchange of capital stock, an excess of par or stated
value of capital stock reacquired over the amount paid therefor, or an excess
from recapitalization; often displayed on the balance sheet as a separate item
or in combination with par or stated value and designated paid-in capital; known also as paid-in surplus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
